DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective study develop recommendation treatment program help alcoholic smoker stop smoking . A sample 175 alcohol dependent cigarette smoker recruit community treat 6-month outpatient alcohol tobacco treatment program . The 175 patient divide two group . One group receive active nicotine patch active nicotine gum . The group receive active nicotine patch placebo nicotine gum . Followup assessment conduct 1-year beginning treatment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Males female least 18 year old . English speaking . Meets criteria alcohol dependence alcohol abuse . Must complete alcohol detoxification program prior enter study . Currently smoke 15 cigarette per day least 3 year history smoking . Have current desire stop smoking stop drinking . Willing complete followup assessment 12 month treatment . Willing provide names 2 people help locate subject followup name one person verify information alcohol tobacco use . One person per household . Allergy nicotine patch nicotine gum . Weigh le 100 pound . Use nicotine product , cigar , pipe smokeless tobacco . Severe skin disorder . Active peptic ulcer . Active joint disease . Heart attack within 3 month prior enter study . Pregnant breastfeed female birth control . Currently take medication treat alcoholism smoking , naltrexone , disulfiram bupropion . Poor vision hear would interfere use cell phone . Lack transportation treatment site live least one hour treatment site . Homeless .
